categories: Category:Battles of the early Imperial campaigns

nodes.text: The Invasion of Tynna was the failed attempt by the Galactic Empire to take control of Tynna.

The Expansion Region planet Tynna was part of the Galactic Empire, with an appointed Imperial Governor. The Empire was not satisfied with the Tynnans performance and tried a full-scale invasion of the world; however, due to the foresight of the Tynnans, they had already installed an impenetrable planetary shield which the Imperial forces were unable to break through. Following this, the planet remained unharmed by the Empire.
